title: What did World War Two teach us about human psychology? - Quora

response.answer_text: WW2 didnt appearently teach us shit, because people continoue to do the same evil shit today. I have never seen more nazi my entire life than during Corona. Corona really shows some people's real color, people denying Holocaust. So many idiots Im lost for words. Anyways. WW2 showed us that people are willing to do evil acts under the influence of an evil leader.
That political leaders are willing for nearly everybody to die to defend their lifestyle, right to the last but one.
